00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A dose scoring ausgab object for beampp: Allows the user to score dose in
00031 #  specified CMs on a region-by-region and/or medium-by-medium basis. Volumes
00032 #  of all regions are assumed to be 1 cm^3 unless explicitly specified by the
00033 #  user.
00034 #
00035 ###############################################################################
00036 */
00037 
00038 
00044 #include <fstream>
00045 #include <string>
00046 
00047 #include "beam_dose_scoring.h"
00048 #include "egs_input.h"
00049 #include "egs_functions.h"
00050 
00051 BEAM_DoseScoring::BEAM_DoseScoring(const string &Name,
00052                                    EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00053     EGS_AusgabObject(Name,f), nreg(0), m_lastCase(-1), nmedia(0),
00054     dose(0), doseM(0), max_dreg(-1), max_medl(0),
00055     score_medium_dose(false), score_region_dose(false) {
00056     otype = "BEAM_DoseScoring";
00057 }
00058 
00059 BEAM_DoseScoring::~BEAM_DoseScoring() {
00060     if (dose) {
00061         delete dose;
00062     }
00063     if (doseM) {
00064         delete doseM;
00065     }
00066 }

00068 void BEAM_DoseScoring::setApplication(EGS_Application *App) {
00069 
00070     app=App;
00071     bapp = dynamic_cast<BEAMpp_Application *>(app);
00072     if (!bapp) {
00073         return;
00074     }
00075     // Get the number of regions in the geometry.
00076     nreg = app->getnRegions();
00077     // Get the number of media in the input file
00078     nmedia = app->getnMedia();
00079     // Get list of regions for which to score dose;
00080     int d_start,d_end;
00081     // first, clear the array of media indices in the dose CMs
00082     for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00083         vector <int> med_ind;
00084         for (int j=0; j<nmedia; j++) {
00085             med_ind.push_back(-1);
00086         }
00087         cm_med.push_back(med_ind);
00088     }
00089     for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00090         if (d_cms[i]==0) {
00091             d_start = 0;
00092         }
00093         else {
00094             d_start = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]-1)+1;
00095         }
00096         d_end = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]);
00097         for (int j=d_start; j<=d_end; j++) {
00098             //note we need to use IsRegionReal instead of isRealRegion because
00099             //the latter registers virtual regions as real in beampp
00100             if (bapp->IsRegionReal(j)) {
00101                 d_region.push_back(j);
00102                 cm_med[i][app->getMedium(j)]=1;
00103             }
00104         }
00105     }
00106     // determine maximum medium name length
00107     char buf[32];
00108     int count = 0;
00109     int imed=0;
00110     for (imed=0; imed < nmedia; imed++) {
00111         sprintf(buf,"%s%n",app->getMediumName(imed),&count);
00112         if (count > max_medl) {
00113             max_medl = count;
00114         }
00115     }
00116     // Flag dose scoring regions in geometry
00117     // and set their volume.
00118     if (d_region.size()) { // specific dose regions provided
00119         // Get maximum dose scoring region
00120         for (vector<int>::iterator it = d_region.begin(); it < d_region.end(); it++) {
00121             if (*it > max_dreg) {
00122                 max_dreg = *it;
00123             }
00124         }
00125         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00126             d_reg_index.push_back(-1);
00127             d_reg_cm_ind.push_back(-1);
00128             vol.push_back(1.0);// set to 1.0
00129         }
00130         for (int i=0; i<d_region.size(); i++) {
00131             d_reg_index[d_region[i]]=i;
00132             if (d_region[i] < vol_list.size()) { //check to make sure we won't exceed array size
00133                 vol[d_region[i]] = vol_list[d_region[i]];
00134             }
00135             for (int j=0; j<d_cms.size(); j++) {
00136                 if (d_region[i]<=bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[j])) {
00137                     d_reg_cm_ind[d_region[i]]=j;
00138                     break;
00139                 }
00140             }
00141         }
00142         if (score_region_dose) {
00143             dose = new EGS_ScoringArray(d_region.size());
00144         }
00145     }
00146     // If requested request memory for medium dose in each CM
00147     if (score_medium_dose) {
00148         doseM =  new EGS_ScoringArray(nmedia*d_cms.size());
00149     }
00150 
00151     description = "\n*******************************************\n";
00152     description +=  "BEAM Dose Scoring Object (";
00153     description += name;
00154     description += ")\n";
00155     description += "*******************************************\n";
00156     description +="\n Dose will be calculated in CM no.'s (start region - end region):\n";
00157     for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00158         if (d_cms[i]==0) {
00159             sprintf(buf,"%d (0 - %d)\n",d_cms[i],bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]));
00160         }
00161         else {
00162             sprintf(buf,"%d (%d - %d)\n",d_cms[i],bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]-1)+1,bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]));
00163         }
00164         description += buf;
00165     }
00166     description += "\n";
00167     if (dose) {
00168         description += " - Region dose will be calculated\n";
00169     }
00170     if (doseM) {
00171         description += " - Medium dose will be calculated\n";
00172     }
00173     description += "\n--------------------------------------\n";
00174     sprintf(buf,"%*s %*s rho/[g/cm**3]\n",max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ");
00175     description += buf;
00176     description += "--------------------------------------\n";
00177     for (imed=0; imed < nmedia; imed++) {
00178         sprintf(buf,"%-*s",max_medl,app->getMediumName(imed));
00179         description += buf;
00180         description += " ";
00181         sprintf(buf,"%5.2f",app->getMediumRho(imed));
00182         description += buf;
00183         description += "\n";
00184     }
00185     description += "\n*******************************************\n\n";
00186     if (d_region.size()) {
00187         d_region.clear();
00188     }
00189 }
00190 
00191 void BEAM_DoseScoring::reportResults() {
00192     egsInformation("\n======================================================\n");
00193     egsInformation("BEAM Dose Scoring Object(%s)\n",name.c_str());
00194     egsInformation("======================================================\n");
00195     EGS_Float normD = 1., normE=1.;
00196     int count = 0;
00197     EGS_Float F = app->getFluence();
00198     egsInformation("=> last case = %lld fluence = %g\n", m_lastCase, F);
00199     /* Normalize to actual source fluence */
00200     egsInformation("\n Dose output for CM no.'s:\n");
00201     for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00202         egsInformation(" %d \n",d_cms[i]);
00203     }
00204     normE = m_lastCase/F;
00205     normD = 1.602e-10*normE;
00206     int irmax_digits = getDigits(max_dreg);
00207     string line;
00208     double r,dr;
00209     if (dose) {
00210         if (normE==1) {
00211             egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of region dosimetry (per particle)\n");
00212             egsInformation(
00213                 "CM %-*s %-*s %-*s rho/[g/cm3]  V/cm3      Edep/[MeV]              D/[Gy]            %n\n",
00214                 irmax_digits,"ir",irmax_digits,"CM reg.",max_medl,"medium",&count);
00215         }
00216         else {
00217             egsInformation("\n==> Summary of region dosimetry (per fluence)\n");
00218             egsInformation(
00219                 "CM %-*s %-*s %-*s rho/[g/cm3]  V/cm3    Edep/[MeV*cm2]            D/[Gy*cm2]         %n\n",
00220                 irmax_digits,"ir",irmax_digits,"CM reg.",max_medl,"medium",&count);
00221         }
00222         line.append(count,'-');
00223         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00224         /* Compute deposited energy and dose */
00225         int ir_cm,fr_cm;
00226         for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00227             if (d_cms[i]==0) {
00228                 ir_cm=0;
00229             }
00230             else {
00231                 ir_cm = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]-1)+1;
00232             }
00233             fr_cm = bapp->CM_reg_end(d_cms[i]);
00234             for (int ireg = ir_cm; ireg <= fr_cm; ireg++) {
00235                 if (d_reg_index[ireg]>=0) {
00236                     if (!(app->isRealRegion(ireg))) {
00237                         continue;
00238                     }
00239                     int imed = app->getMedium(ireg);
00240                     EGS_Float rho = app->getMediumRho(imed);
00241                     EGS_Float mass = vol[ireg]*rho;
00242                     dose->currentResult(d_reg_index[ireg],r,dr);
00243                     if (r > 0) {
00244                         dr = dr/r;
00245                     }
00246                     else {
00247                         dr=1;
00248                     }
00249                     egsInformation("%-2d %-*d %-*d %-*s %7.3f   %7.3f  %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%  %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%\n",
00250                                    d_cms[i],max(irmax_digits,2),ireg,max(irmax_digits,7),ireg-ir_cm,max_medl,app->getMediumName(imed),rho,vol[ireg],r*normE,dr*100.,r*normD/mass,dr*100.);
00251                 }
00252             }
00253             egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00254         }
00255     }
00256     if (doseM) {
00257         vector<EGS_Float> massM(d_cms.size()*nmedia,0);
00258         int imed = 0;
00259         for (int ir=0; ir<nreg; ir++) {
00260             if (d_reg_index[ir]>=0) {
00261                 imed = app->getMedium(ir);
00262                 massM[imed+d_reg_cm_ind[ir]*nmedia] += app->getMediumRho(imed)*vol[ir];
00263             }
00264         }
00265         if (normE==1) {
00266             egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of media dosimetry (per particle)\n");
00267             egsInformation(
00268                 "CM %*s %*s     Edep/[MeV]              D/[Gy]            %n\n",
00269                 max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00270         }
00271         else {
00272             egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of media dosimetry (per fluence)\n");
00273             egsInformation(
00274                 "CM %*s %*s     Edep/[MeV*cm2]              D/[Gy*cm2]            %n\n",
00275                 max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00276         }
00277         line="";
00278         line.append(count,'-');
00279         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00280         /* Compute deposited energy in medium (MeV)*/
00281         for (int i=0; i<d_cms.size(); i++) {
00282             for (int im=0; im<nmedia; im++) {
00283                 doseM->currentResult(im+i*nmedia,r,dr);
00284                 if (cm_med[i][im] >= 0) {
00285                     if (r > 0) {
00286                         dr = dr/r;
00287                     }
00288                     else {
00289                         dr=1;
00290                     }
00291                     egsInformation(
00292                         "%-2d %-*s %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%% %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%\n",
00293                         d_cms[i],max_medl,app->getMediumName(im),r*normE,dr*100.,r*normD/massM[im+i*nmedia],dr*100.);
00294                 }
00295             }
00296             egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00297         }
00298     }
00299     egsInformation("\n======================================================\n");
00300 }
00301 
00302 bool BEAM_DoseScoring::storeState(ostream &data) const {
00303     //egsInformation("Storing BEAM_DoseScoring...\n");
00304     if (!egsStoreI64(data,m_lastCase)) {
00305         return false;
00306     }
00307     data << endl;
00308     if (dose  && !dose->storeState(data)) {
00309         return false;
00310     }
00311     if (doseM && !doseM->storeState(data)) {
00312         return false;
00313     }
00314     return true;
00315 }
00316 
00317 bool  BEAM_DoseScoring::setState(istream &data) {
00318     if (!egsGetI64(data,m_lastCase)) {
00319         return false;
00320     }
00321     if (dose  && !dose->setState(data)) {
00322         return false;
00323     }
00324     if (doseM && !doseM->setState(data)) {
00325         return false;
00326     }
00327     return true;
00328 }
00329 
00330 bool  BEAM_DoseScoring::addState(istream &data) {
00331     int err = addTheStates(data);
00332     if (err) {
00333         egsInformation("Error code: %d",err);
00334         return false;
00335     }
00336     return true;
00337 }
00338 
00339 int  BEAM_DoseScoring::addTheStates(istream &data) {
00340     EGS_I64 tmp_case;
00341     if (!egsGetI64(data,tmp_case)) {
00342         return 4401;
00343     }
00344     m_lastCase += tmp_case;
00345     if (dose) {
00346         EGS_ScoringArray tmp(nreg);
00347         if (!tmp.setState(data)) {
00348             return 4402;
00349         }
00350         (*dose) += tmp;
00351     }
00352     if (doseM) {
00353         EGS_ScoringArray tmpM(nmedia);
00354         if (!tmpM.setState(data)) {
00355             return 4403;
00356         }
00357         (*doseM) += tmpM;
00358     }
00359     return 0;
00360 }
00361 
00362 void BEAM_DoseScoring::resetCounter() {
00363     m_lastCase = 0;
00364     if (dose) {
00365         dose->reset();
00366     }
00367     if (doseM) {
00368         doseM->reset();
00369     }
00370 }

00372 
00373 extern "C" {
00374 
00375     BEAM_DOSE_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_AusgabObject *createAusgabObject(EGS_Input *input,
00376             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00377         const static char *func = "createAusgabObject(beam_dose_scoring)";
00378         if (!input) {
00379             egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func);
00380             return 0;
00381         }
00382         /* get CMs to score dose in */
00383         vector <int> d_cms;
00384         int err1=input->getInput("dose CMs",d_cms);
00385         if (err1) {
00386             egsWarning("%s: No CMs input.  Dose will not be scored.\n",func);
00387             return 0;
00388         }
00389         /* get dose scoring mode: region dose, medium dose or both */
00390         vector<string> allowed_mode;
00391         allowed_mode.push_back("no");
00392         allowed_mode.push_back("yes");
00393         int d_in_medium = input->getInput("medium dose",allowed_mode,0);
00394         int d_in_region = input->getInput("region dose",allowed_mode,1);
00395         if (d_in_medium == 0 && d_in_region == 0) {
00396             egsWarning("%s: Neither dose in regions nor dose in medium specified.  Dose will not be scored.\n",func);
00397             return 0;
00398         }
00399         vector <int> vreg_start,vreg_stop;
00400         vector <EGS_Float> v_in,volin;
00401         //give the user the option to input volumes of regions if they know them
00402         int err2 = input->getInput("start volume region",vreg_start);
00403         int err3 = input->getInput("stop volume region",vreg_stop);
00404         int err4 = input->getInput("volume",v_in);
00405         if (err4) {
00406             egsWarning("%s: No dose zone volumes input.  Will assume 1 cm^3 for all regions.\n",func);
00407         }
00408         else {
00409             if (!err2 && !err3) {
00410                 if (vreg_start.size()==vreg_stop.size()) {
00411                     if (v_in.size()<vreg_start.size()) {
00412                         egsWarning("%s: No volumes input for region groups %d to %d.\n Will use last input volume for remaining groups.\n",func,v_in.size()+1,vreg_start.size());
00413                         for (int i=v_in.size()+1; i<vreg_start.size(); i++) {
00414                             v_in.push_back(v_in[v_in.size()-1]);
00415                         }
00416                     }
00417                     for (int i=0; i<vreg_start.size(); i++) {
00418                         if (volin.size()<=vreg_stop[i]) {
00419                             //enlarge to volin array
00420                             for (int j=volin.size(); j<=vreg_stop[i]; j++) {
00421                                 volin.push_back(1.0);
00422                             }
00423                         }
00424                         for (int j=vreg_start[i]; j<=vreg_stop[i]; j++) {
00425                             volin[j]=v_in[i];
00426                         }
00427                     }
00428                 }
00429                 else {
00430                     egsWarning("%s: Unequal number of start and stop regions.  Will assume 1 cm^3 for all regions.\n",func);
00431                 }
00432             }
00433         }
00434         //=================================================
00435 
00436         /* Setup dose scoring object with input parameters */
00437         BEAM_DoseScoring *result = new BEAM_DoseScoring("",f);
00438         if (volin.size()) {
00439             result->setVol(volin);
00440         }
00441         else {
00442             result->setVol(1.0);
00443         }
00444         result->setDoseCMs(d_cms);
00445         if (d_in_medium) {
00446             result->setMediumScoring(true);
00447         }
00448         if (d_in_region) {
00449             result->setRegionScoring(true);
00450         }
00451         result->setName(input);
00452         return result;
00453     }
00454 
00455 }
